translation.en: [woman] It's getting closer, but it's not getting any nicer.
[woman] It did not look like this on the internet.
translation.es: No se veía así en Internet.

translation.en: Yeah, I don't remember it being this sausage color.
translation.es: Sí, no la recuerdode este color salchicha.

translation.en: [young man] Okay, that's the last box, Mum.
translation.es: Esa es la última caja, mamá.

translation.en: Thanks, Jack. I'm gonna take a look at the new shop.
translation.es: Gracias, Jack. Iré a ver la nueva tienda.

translation.en: How about you ride down, and I'll see you there? No worries, Mum.
translation.es: - ¿Qué tal si vas en bici y te veo allí?- Claro, mamá.

translation.en: [Jack's mum] Her mum heard we moved into town.
translation.es: Su madre se enteróde que nos mudamos aquí.

translation.en: [Jack chuckles] Go-karts are for kids, Mum. Uh, you're a kid.
translation.es: - Los karts son para niños, mamá.- Tú eres un niño.

translation.en: I prefer you driving one of those than pulling cupcakes in my car.
translation.es: Prefiero que conduzcas uno de esosa que hagas trompas con mi auto.

translation.en: -They're called donuts, thank you. -I know what they're called.
translation.es: - Se dice "trompos", gracias.- Ya lo sé. No los hagas más.

translation.en: -Stop doing them. -I won't even know anyone.
translation.es: - Se dice "trompos", gracias.- Ya lo sé. No los hagas más. No conoceré a nadie.

translation.en: That's the point. You'll go to school with these kids once the holidays are over.
translation.es: Es la idea. Serán tus compañeros de clasecuando terminen las vacaciones.

translation.en: Look, here are your choices. You either go to the party,
translation.es: Estas son tus opciones.Vas a la fiesta

translation.en: or you can stay here and help me all afternoon.
translation.es: o te quedas aquí ayudándome toda la tarde.

translation.en: You know, because a platypus lays eggs and produces milk,
translation.es: Sabes, un ornitorrinco pone huevosy produce leche,

translation.en: it's the only animal that can make its own custard.
translation.es: entonces es el único animalque puede hacer flan.

translation.en: Wait. Are you laughing with me or at me? With you. Yeah.
translation.es: - Espera. ¿Te ríes de mí o conmigo?- Contigo. Sí.

translation.en: I'm Colin. Colin Faber. Jack. Jack Hooper. Nice to meet you.
translation.es: - Me llamo Colin. Colin Faber.- Jack. Jack Hooper. Mucho gusto.

translation.en: They're so fast. They are, aren't they?
translation.es: - Son muy rápidos.- Sí que lo son.

translation.en: I'm a bit nervous about driving one of these things.
translation.es: Me pone un poco nerviosomanejar estas cosas.

translation.en: -I've never done it before. -Neither have I.
translation.es: - Será mi primera vez.- Para mí también.

translation.en: But I'm sure it'll be all right.
Come on. Hey, it'll be an adventure.
Who's the dude man? Dean Zeta.
[Colin] State kart champion. Everyone thinks he'll win Nationals this year.
translation.es: Campeón estatal de karts.Ahora, es el favorito para los nacionales.

translation.en: Remember when I asked you if you were laughing with me or at me?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas cuando te preguntési te reías conmigo o de mí?

translation.en: It was, like, one minute ago. [Colin] Yeah, well, he and his mates laugh at me.
translation.es: - Fue hace un minuto.- Él y sus amigos se ríen de mí.

translation.en: but I prefer to just ignore them and get on with my day.
translation.es: pero prefiero ignorarlos y vivir mi vida.

translation.en: Thanks for holding the party here. I appreciate the business.
translation.es: Gracias por celebrar la fiesta aquí.Es bueno para el negocio.

translation.en: Have you thought anymore about coaching my boy?
Dean has a real shot at Nationals this year.
translation.es: Dean es favorito para los nacionales.

translation.en: All he needs someone with experience to help him get ready.
translation.es: Necesita a alguien con experienciaque lo ayude a prepararse.

translation.en: And you'd make a great asset to our team, Patrick.
translation.es: Serías un gran aporte al equipo, Patrick.

translation.en: Because your boy doesn't have enough talent and...
translation.es: Porque tu hijono tiene suficiente talento...

translation.en: How long have you been karting?
I don't know. I mean, I slid off.
That's because you went on the outside of the track.
translation.es: Porque ibas por fuera de la pista.

translation.en: There were marbles on the track?
All the loose bits of dirt and rubber from the tires are swept onto the outside,
translation.es: La tierra suelta y los trozos de llantasvuelan hacia los costados

translation.en: and when you drive over them, they're super slippery.
translation.es: y cuando vas sobre ellos resbalan mucho.

translation.en: Yeah, but I prefer to make 'em go faster.
translation.es: Sí, pero prefiero hacerlos más rápidos.

translation.en: Well, they're actually called chief engineers, but yeah. I want to work in Formula 1 one day.
translation.es: Se dice "ingeniero jefe", pero sí.Quiero trabajar en la Fórmula 1 algún día.

translation.en: When you spun off, you nearly took me out.
translation.es: Cuando te resbalaste, casi me chocas.

translation.en: I think you're mad because I almost beat you.
translation.es: Estás enojado porque casi te gano.

translation.en: Stay out of my way. That's your first and only warning.
translation.es: No te metas conmigo.Es tu primera y única advertencia.

translation.en: [Jack] What's with the matching vests? [Colin] That's Mandy's mum and dad.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué llevan chalecos iguales?- Son la mamá y el papá de Mandy.

translation.en: He's like a race car guy. Owns a team.
translation.es: Él es piloto de carreras. Tiene un equipo.

translation.en: [Jack] Never gonna beat you, am I, Dad?
After everything that happened in Sydney,
translation.es: Después de todo lo que pasó en Sídney,¿te llevas el auto otra vez,

translation.en: you take my car again, two days after we get here.
translation.es: Después de todo lo que pasó en Sídney,¿te llevas el auto otra vez, a dos días de llegar aquí?

translation.en: Mum, I was in the middle of nowhere.
translation.es: Mamá, estaba en medio de la nada.

translation.en: I mean, there was no traffic.
And I'm driving a station wagon.
You were chucking donuts in an empty car park, son.
translation.es: Hacías tromposen un estacionamiento vacío, hijo.

translation.en: I apologize, officer. It will not happen again.
translation.es: Le pido disculpas, oficial.No volverá a suceder.

translation.en: considering there was no harm done,
I'm prepared to let you off with a warning. A stern warning.
translation.es: ...así que solo te haré una advertencia.Una muy severa.

translation.en: If I catch you at it again, you will be in very hot water.
translation.es: Si te atrapo de nuevo,estarás en serios problemas.

translation.en: Well, I should hit the road.
Have you just moved into town?
Yeah, we're taking a lease on a shop on Queen Street.
translation.es: Sí, alquilamos una tienda en Queen Street.

translation.en: Well, I might see you around sometime, at some point.
translation.es: Quizá te vuelva a ver por ahí,en algún momento.

translation.en: Well, why do you keep doing it? I don't know.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué sigues haciendo eso?- No lo sé.

translation.en: That's not a good enough reason, mate.
One day, your luck's gonna run out. And it won't end well.
translation.es: Un día, se te acabará la suerte.Y esto no terminará bien.

translation.en: I'm hoping that we can build a life here.
translation.es: Espero que podamosconstruir una vida aquí.

translation.en: You know you can tell me anything.
translation.es: Sabes que puedes confiar en mí.

translation.en: -Maybe you want to talk to me about Dad-- -Mum, I'm fine.
translation.es: - Quizá quieras hablar de papá.- Mamá, estoy bien.

translation.en: Look. I got sausage because it matches the color of this house.
translation.es: Mira, compré salchichasporque combinan con el color de la casa.

translation.en: you've been bitten by the racing bug.
translation.es: ¿Te mordió el bicho de las carreras?

translation.en: Is that when you can't stop thinking about how much of a rush it is?
translation.es: ¿Significa que no paro de pensaren la adrenalina que me da

translation.en: And you feel like it's what you were put on earth to do?
translation.es: y que siento que nací para esto?

translation.en: I reckon you should turn around...
and never speak of it again.
You had one three-lap race in which you spun off and finished last,
translation.es: Corriste tres vueltas, te saliste de la pistay terminaste último,

translation.en: and now you want to make it your life's work?
translation.es: ¿y ahora quieres que sea tu vida?

translation.en: You know what would be a better idea?
Collect every dollar you have, and your parents have, and your friends have...
translation.es: Reúne cada dólar que tengas tú,tus padres, tus amigos,

translation.en: and buy the nicest boat you can.
translation.es: compra el barco más lindo que puedas.

translation.en: Park it in the middle of the harbor...
That'd be a better use of your time and money than trying to make it as a race driver.
translation.es: Es un mejor uso de tu tiempo y dineroque intentar ser piloto de carreras.

translation.en: Hit the bricks, kid. You don't want this life.
translation.es: Lárgate, niño. Esta vida no te conviene.

translation.en: -And your prices are too high. -[flies buzzing] No wonder no one's here.
translation.es: Y tus precios son muy altos.Con razón no hay nadie aquí.

translation.en: We don't open for three hours.
I don't have enough money to pay you to drive here.
translation.es: No me alcanza el dinero para las vueltas.

translation.en: And when I say enough, I mean any.
translation.es: Bueno, en realidad no tengo dinero.

translation.en: I've got an idea that could work for both of us.
translation.es: Tengo una buena idea para ambos.

translation.en: Clearly, this place needs some TLC.
translation.es: Sin dudas, este lugar necesita atención.

translation.en: So employ me to help out, but instead of paying me...
translation.es: Contrátame para ayudarpero en vez de pagarme,

translation.en: let me drive three laps of the track for every hour I work.
translation.es: me dejas dar tres vueltaspor cada hora trabajada.

translation.en: One lap. And only when I say.
translation.es: Una vuelta. Y solo cuando yo diga.

translation.en: -Three, because the track is short. -One, because of fuel costs.
translation.es: - Tres, la pista es corta.- Una, el costo del combustible.

translation.en: Three, and didn't you hear what I said about the track being--
translation.es: Tres, ¿no escuchasteque dije que la pista...?

translation.en: One. And I'm not loving this backchat.
translation.es: Una. Y no me gusta tu descaro.

translation.en: -Would have done it for one. -Would have agreed to three.
translation.es: - Habría aceptado una.- Habría aceptado tres.

translation.en: All right, you can start now.
When the track gets dusty, it's too slippery to race on.
translation.es: Una pista polvorienta resbala muchopara correr.

translation.en: You're gonna spray it with water to keep it intact.
translation.es: Rocíala con agua para mantenerla intacta.

translation.en: You want me to spray the whole track using this?
translation.es: ¿Quieres que rocíe toda la pista con esto?

translation.en: Why don't we use that enormous water truck?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no usamosese enorme camión de agua?

translation.en: [Patrick] I trust this backchat won't be an ongoing feature of our conversation.
translation.es: Espero que tu descaro no sea una constanteen nuestra conversación.

translation.en: Do not enter my caravan without an invitation.
translation.es: No entres a mi caravana sin invitación.

translation.en: Hey. I googled you last night.
translation.es: Oye, noche te busqué en Google.

translation.en: It said you used to race cars. Won some big stuff.
translation.es: Decía que eras corredor de autos,que ganaste un gran premio.

translation.en: Get to it. You're burning sunlight. Chop chop.
So I, um... I got a job today.
Oh, well done, you. That's great.
Not seeing a water sprayer. This mean I get to drive?
translation.es: No veo el rociador.¿Significa que puedo correr?

translation.en: I can't drive with this thing on.
You've got until sunset to paint the garage with it.
translation.es: Tienes hasta el atardecerpara pintar el garaje.

translation.en: Get to it. You're burning sunlight. Chop chop.
why don't you shove this helmet...
translation.es: ...¿por qué no te metes este casco
donde no te da la luz?

translation.en: Does this mean I get to drive?
I need you to wash all these.
you're gonna do it with your feet.
You know that's super weird, right?
translation.es: Sabes que eso es muy raro, ¿no?

translation.en: Get to it. You're burning sunlight. Chop chop.
Can't you offset the top from the center and add more caster?
translation.es: ¿Y si lo compensas desde el centroy le agregas más ángulo de giro?
Sé que no es lo común, pero bien afinado

translation.en: but if you tune it right, it's worth at least a tenth of a second a lap.
translation.es: Sé que no es lo común, pero bien afinado lograrás al menos una décima de segundopor vuelta.

translation.en: Really? Is that what you reckon?
If that were true, then why aren't other teams doing it?
translation.es: Si así fuera,¿por qué no lo hacen otros equipos?

translation.en: I think we'll stick with what we know. It's worked so far.
translation.es: Seguiremos haciendo lo que sabemos.Ha funcionado hasta ahora.

translation.en: Leroy wouldn't know a fast kart if it was stapled to--
translation.es: Leroy no reconocería un kart rápido ni...

translation.en: He has 20 years of experience. And he's still wrong. Amazing.
translation.es: - Tiene 20 años de experiencia.- Y aún así está equivocado. Increíble.

translation.en: Put me in charge of the kart. I'll be a better chief engineer.
translation.es: Ponme a cargo del kart.Seré mejor ingeniera jefe.

translation.en: Sweetheart, you know it's not that simple.
translation.es: Cariño, sabes que no es tan fácil.

translation.en: How am I gonna learn if I never do it?
Maybe you'll get your chance one day.
But right now we all need to focus on our jobs so your brother wins Nationals.
translation.es: Ahora cada uno a su tarea,así tu hermano gana los nacionales.

translation.en: I need to do some driving, man.
Regional championships are next week. Regionals?
translation.es: - Los regionales son la próxima semana.- ¿Los regionales?

translation.en: You've got a lot of work to do before you're ready to race.
translation.es: Te falta muchopara ester listo para correr.

translation.en: Then why am I spraying the track?
Or painting the walls with my head?
translation.es: ¿O pinto las paredes con la cabeza?

translation.en: I need to do some driving.
You'll drive when I say so.
You can't cancel it, it's a deal.
translation.es: No puedes cancelarlo. Es un trato.

translation.en: You're not racing in Regionals. But I will let you drive.
translation.es: No competirás en los regionales.Pero te daré tus vueltas.

translation.en: you're gonna take everything inside that shed and put it in the bin.
translation.es: ...pondrás todo lo que hayen ese cobertizo en la basura.

translation.en: I'm gonna turn that into a snack bar.
-You're burning sunlight-- Chop-- -Yeah, sunlight, I know. Chop chop.
translation.es: - Estás desperdiciando...- Luz, lo sé. ¡Va, va!

translation.en: Looks like one of the Transformers threw up.
Man, you scared the hell out of me.
Why are you leaping out of shadows?
translation.es: ¿Por qué me acechas desde las sombras?

translation.en: -You couldn't see me? -They're shadows! Of course I couldn't see you!
translation.es: - ¿No me viste?- Está oscuro. Claro que no te vi.

translation.en: Can you help me get my kart ready to race at Regionals?
translation.es: ¿Me ayudas a preparar mi kartpara los regionales?

translation.en: [Jack] And I don't have any money.
it could end up costing you money.
Well, since you put it like that...

translation.es: ¿Por qué me lo pides a mí?

translation.en: Well, I don't know anything about karts. And I don't know anyone who does,
translation.es: No sé nada de karts.No conozco a nadie más que sepa.

translation.en: So you're asking me because you didn't have any other choices?
translation.es: ¿Me lo pidesporque no tenías otra opción?

translation.en: Absolutely. And that I think you'd do a good job.
translation.es: Absolutamente.Y creo que harías un buen trabajo.

translation.en: -I'll do it, but with one stipulation. -Okay.
translation.es: - Lo haré con una condición.- De acuerdo.

translation.en: I'm chief engineer. That means I'm in charge of the kart.
translation.es: Seré la ingeniera jefe.O sea, estoy a cargo del kart.

translation.en: [Mandy] You want to race this at Regionals?
It looks like it was hit by a truck.
translation.es: Parece que lo atropelló un camión.

translation.en: Was it hit by a truck?
That's the way we found it.
I can fix it. Let's start by sorting everything.
Put the engine parts there, the brake parts there,
translation.es: Las partes del motor ahí,las del freno ahí,

translation.en: the steering parts here, and the exhaust parts here.
translation.es: las de la dirección aquíy las piezas de escape aquí.

translation.en: Clearly, we need to start from basics.
Okay, listen closely. There'll be an exam afterwards.
translation.es: Escuchen bien. Habrá un examen después.

translation.en: Will there really be an exam?
No, Colin. That's the axle. This is the brake disc.
translation.es: No, Colin.Ese es el eje. Este es el disco de freno.
- Ella es genial.- Esto, la pinza de freno.

translation.en: -I'm just happy there isn't an exam. -Yeah.
translation.es: - Qué bueno que no habrá examen.- Sí.
La lentitud. Y esto no es lento.

translation.en: So where do we test drive it?
Are you sure we're meant to be driving on this?
Sometimes you don't ask for permission, Col.
translation.es: A veces, no pides permiso, Col.

translation.en: You just do it and apologize later.
translation.es: Lo haces y luego te disculpas.

translation.en: Now, this is a test drive, so take it slow.
translation.es: Esto es una prueba, así que con calma.

translation.en: I don't think he heard you.

translation.es: - ¿Nos vemos mañana en la pista? - Sí...

translation.en: about that. This was a one-off.
translation.es: ...sobre eso. No lo volveremos a hacer.

translation.en: If my dad finds out I helped a rival team...
translation.es: Si mi papá se enterade que ayudé a un equipo rival,

translation.en: he'll go off like a frog in a sock.
translation.es: perderá la cabeza de la furia.

translation.en: Don't go on the outside of the track like you did at my party.
translation.es: No te salgas de la pistacomo en mi fiesta.

translation.en: If you get on the marbles, you will slide off.
translation.es: Si corres sobre las canicas, patinarás.

translation.en: Hey, what if we get you a funnel?
That'd be faster. Then I could just pour it right in there.
translation.es: Comerás más rápidosi lo vierto directamente.

translation.en: Are you working at that kart place today?
Um, no. Today's my first race.
translation.es: No. Hoy es mi primera carrera.

translation.en: I'll get Colin to FaceTime you.
translation.es: Colin te lo trasmitirá por Facebook.

translation.en: Just answer the call. Race starts at 11:00.
translation.es: Tú contesta la llamada.La carrera comienza a las 11.

translation.en: You know you can't let them treat you like that.
translation.es: No debes permitirles que te traten así.

translation.en: I know. I just don't know what to do about it.
translation.es: Lo sé, pero ¿qué puedo hacer al respecto?

translation.en: No way. I don't want to miss out on an adventure.
translation.es: Claro que no.No quiero perderme la aventura.
Después de la sesión de calificación KA3,el favorito, Dean Zeta,

translation.en: title favorite Dean Zeta is in first place!
translation.es: Después de la sesión de calificación KA3,el favorito, Dean Zeta, está en primer lugar.

translation.en: In second is Jess Hoyt, with Juliet Kay a solid third.
translation.es: En segundo lugar está Chase Hoyy Juliet Kay en un tercero sólido.

translation.en: Top three finishers in the upcoming final move straight through to the State Championships.
translation.es: Los tres primeros en esta finalpasarán directo al campeonato estatal.

translation.en: [in unison] I attack until I lead. I take no prisoners.
Whoever said winning isn't everything is a fool who knows nothing.
translation.es: El que dijo que ganar no es importantees un tonto ignorante.

translation.en: [announcer] This race is in the KA3 class.
translation.es: Esta carrera es en la clase KA3.

translation.en: the top three finishers go straight through to the State Championship.
translation.es: los tres primeros finalistaspasan directo al campeonato estatal.

translation.en: It's my son's first race today. -Oh, how nice. -Yeah.
translation.es: - Es la primera carrera de mi hijo.- Qué bien.

translation.en: Okay, here they come, folks, in formation. Two by two.
translation.es: Aquí vienen en formación de dos en dos.

translation.en: We're getting set for a start. Green light's on.
translation.es: Listos para la largada.La luz verde está encendida.

translation.en: Oh! That was a lunge, with a capital L!
Dean Zeta takes the lead, and he's streaking away.
translation.es: Dean Zeta toma la delantera y se aleja.

translation.en: And young Hooper now thunders through into tenth place.
translation.es: Y el joven Hooper se lanzaal décimo lugar.
- Está adentro, está afuera.- Eso es bueno.

translation.en: He is wearing this go-kart like an old suit!
translation.es: Maneja su kart con mucha soltura.

translation.en: Is it safe? Well, they're wearing helmets.
He's going after the champagne, the glory, and the gold!
translation.es: Va por la champaña,la gloria y las chicas.

translation.en: Come on, Hooper! You can do it, son!
He uses the whole of the track.
He's got his eyes on first place for sure.
translation.es: Tiene la mirada fija en el primer puesto.

translation.en: -Jack Hooper takes fourth. -Come on, get out of the way!
translation.es: - Jack Hooper está cuarto.- ¡Quítate del camino!

translation.en: [Mandy] Don't go on the outside of the track. You will slide off.
translation.es: No te salgas de la pista o patinarás.

translation.en: [Patrick] What the hell are you doing?
translation.es: - ¿Qué demonios haces?- Salir tercero en mi primera carrera.

translation.en: -Coming third in my first race. -But I told you you weren't ready.
translation.es: - ¿Qué demonios haces?- Salir tercero en mi primera carrera. Te dije que no estabas listo.

translation.en: Which you just proved by making that reckless overtake.
That overtake got me through to States.
translation.es: Esa maniobra me llevó a las estatales.

translation.en: Yeah. It could have put you in a coffin. But it didn't.
translation.es: - Sí, te podría haber llevado a un ataúd.- Pero no pasó.

translation.en: I had a lot of help from my mates.
And I... I need help from you too.
-[groans] -When I say coach, I mean teach me everything I need to know about driving.
translation.es: Quiero decir, ¿me enseñarás todolo que necesito saber sobre conducir?

translation.en: I don't wanna be doing any more of this spraying
or painting or cleaning with my feet.
translation.es: pintando ni limpiando con mis pies.

translation.en: All of that was to improve your fitness. All right?
translation.es: Eso fue para mejorar tu condición física.

translation.en: The spraying develops your arms, so they don't get tired when you steer.
translation.es: Rociar la pista te fortalece los brazospara que no se cansen al volante.

translation.en: The painting strengthens your neck, so you can handle the G-forces when you corner.
translation.es: Pintar te fortalece el cuellopara controlar las fuerzas G al girar.

translation.en: The cleaning improves your ankles' flexibility, so you can work the pedals faster.
translation.es: La limpieza mejora la flexibilidadde los tobillos para los pedales.

translation.en: See? This is exactly why I need you to be my coach.
translation.es: ¿Ves? Precisamente por eso necesitoque seas mi entrenador.

translation.en: I will coach you, but you are gonna do everything I say.
translation.es: Te entrenaré,pero harás todo lo que yo diga.

translation.en: Oh, those corn are great, by the way. You're gonna love it.
translation.es: Los maíces están muy buenos, por cierto.Les encantarán.

translation.en: I'm gonna get you to pull over and, uh, turn off your ignition, please.
translation.es: ...detente y apaga el motor, por favor.

translation.en: [Barry] Your mother is going to be very disappointed.
translation.es: Tu madre va a estar muy decepcionada.

translation.en: I'm ordering you to stop the vehicle.
translation.es: Te ordeno que detengas el vehículo.

translation.en: What on earth do you think you're doing, mate?
I need you to ask my mother out on a date.
translation.es: Necesito que invites a salir a mi madre.

translation.en: -And why would I want to do that? -Because you like her.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué haría eso?- Porque te gusta.

translation.en: I hope your conversation skills are better than this on the date.
translation.es: Espero que tu dicciónsea mejor que esto en la cita.

translation.en: There isn't gonna be any date, mate.
-Why not? -What makes you even think I like her?
translation.es: - ¿Por qué no?- ¿Por qué crees que me gusta?

translation.en: Ha! See? There it is. That's the type of cheeky banter my mother loves.
translation.es: ¿Ves? Por eso. Mi madre amaese tipo de respuestas.

translation.en: Why are you asking me to do this?
You're a cop, so you're probably not a criminal.
translation.es: Eres policía, así que no eres delincuente.

translation.en: And you're not wearing a wedding ring. You are single, right?
translation.es: No llevas anillo de bodas.Eres soltero, ¿no?

translation.en: And I'm guessing your dad's out of the picture. Yeah.
translation.es: - Supongo que tu padre no está presente.- Así es.

translation.en: So, uh, what do you reckon?
when I talk to women socially,
I have been known to freeze up from time to time.
-Make that all of the time. -Okay, well...
Take a moment to come up with an opening line.
translation.es: Tómate un momento para pensar qué dirás.

translation.en: Would you like to go out to dinner with me?
Why do you have an accent all of a sudden?
Okay, let's try it again. One more time, yeah?
translation.es: Bien, probemos de nuevo. Una vez más.

translation.en: Would you like to go out to dinner with me sometime? Sometime next week?
translation.es: ¿Te gustaría cenar conmigo algún día?¿La semana que viene?

translation.en: Can I help you with anything?
Christie, I was wondering if you'd, uh...
like to go out to dinner with me sometime... next week.
Didn't need to make those changes to the kart after all.
The kart was fast. I won.
If your kart was fast, you would have pulled away.
translation.es: Si tu kart fuera rápido,te habrías adelantado.

translation.en: But you won by half a length.
If you started anywhere but the front, you would have lost.
translation.es: Si no hubieras arrancado primero,habrías perdido.

translation.en: I've been asked out on a date.
I don't know what you did, but...
I'm sure I have no idea what you're talking about.
translation.es: No sé de qué estás hablando.

translation.en: You know you don't have to fix everything, right?
translation.es: Sabe que no tienes que arreglar todo, ¿no?

translation.en: You don't always have to be the strong one.
translation.es: No siempre tienes que ser el fuerte.

translation.en: It's okay if you want to, you know...
translation.es: Está bien si quieres, ya sabes...

translation.en: Welcome to race school. -What's that for? -[horn blast]
translation.es: - Bienvenido a la escuela de carreras.- ¿Para qué es eso?

translation.en: Backchat. It will also be used as a teaching aid.
translation.es: Tu descaro.También lo usaré como material didáctico.

translation.en: Place your hands on the wheel.
The correct position is nine o'clock and three o'clock.
translation.es: La posición correcta es:las nueve en punto y las tres en punto.

translation.en: You'll always know which way your front wheels are pointing
translation.es: Sabrás la direcciónde las ruedas delanteras

translation.en: if your hands mirror their position on the steering wheel.
translation.es: si las manos reflejansu posición en el volante.

translation.en: When the wheel's turned, a string will be tied on the accelerator.
translation.es: La cuerda vadel volante al acelerador.

translation.en: You won't be able to press it without snapping it.
translation.es: No podrás acelerar sin romperlacuando gires.

translation.en: But as the wheel straightens... it'll start to give you some slack.
translation.es: Pero cuando el volante esté derecho,la cuerda se aflojará.

translation.en: I want you to drive as fast as you can.
translation.es: Conduce lo más rápido que puedas.

translation.en: But you don't snap the string.
You keep your hands at nine and three at all times.
translation.es: Las manos a las nueve y a las trestodo el tiempo.

translation.en: [Patrick] You've got to find that balance between the accelerator and the steering wheel.
translation.es: Debes encontrar el equilibrioentre el acelerador y el volante.

translation.en: Not so easy breezy now, is it? Huh?

translation.es: Bien. A la misma hora mañana.

translation.en: Hey. What if the race line is blocked?
translation.es: Oye. ¿Y si tengo el camino bloqueado?

translation.en: I mean, how do I get past?
Well, each situation's different, so there's no right answer.
translation.es: Cada situación es diferente,no hay una respuesta correcta.

translation.en: But I like to apply the rules of the overtake.
translation.es: Pero me gusta aplicarlas reglas para sobrepasar.

translation.en: analyze what each driver is doing, and take advantage of any mistake.
translation.es: analizar lo que hacen los otros pilotosy aprovechar cualquier error.
No me fue muy bien hoy.

translation.en: Feeling sorry for yourself isn't gonna make you a better driver,
translation.es: Sentir pena por ti mismono te hará mejor piloto.

translation.en: it's just gonna make you annoying to be around.
Yeah, but it pisses me off.

translation.es: Cuando te busqué en Google,leí que te retiraste como piloto

translation.en: it said that you retired from racing in the middle of the season.
translation.es: Cuando te busqué en Google,leí que te retiraste como piloto en medio de la temporada.

translation.en: She never says hi to us.

translation.es: Acelera al salir de la curva.

translation.en: Remember your balance here. Take a tighter line.
translation.es: Recuerda tu equilibrio. Gira y luego endereza.

translation.en: That's the first time I've seen your teeth. All right, don't get cocky.
translation.es: - Primera vez que te veo los dientes.- No seas engreído.

translation.en: You've got a long road ahead of you.
You've got to prepare your kart for State. Your friends are gonna help again?
translation.es: Debes preparar el kart para las estatales.¿Tus amigos te volverán a ayudar?

translation.en: Is he the one who made it quick?
[Jack] He just found out the engine runs on petrol.
translation.es: Acaba de descubrirque funciona a gasolina.

translation.en: We need the one who made it quick.
translation.es: Necesitamos al que le dio velocidad.

translation.en: We've been over this. They're shadows.
I wouldn't have made it through to State without you.
translation.es: No habría llegado a las estatales sin ti.

translation.en: I know. Can you make it quicker?
I don't know if I want to.
I told you not to go on the outside of the track, and that's exactly what you did.
translation.es: Te dije que no te salieras de la pistay es exacto lo que hiciste.

translation.en: The trick is to find a way to unblock it.
translation.es: El truco es encontrarla forma de sortearlos.

translation.en: I need to know this stuff.
You only say that because you want me to help you.
translation.es: Solo lo dices porque quieres que te ayude.

translation.en: That doesn't mean it's not true.
translation.es: No significa que no sea cierto.

translation.en: I'll take that as a definite maybe.
Is this all your handiwork, Jack?
You're working with Mike Zeta's daughter?
translation.es: ¿Trabajas con la hija de Mike Zeta?

translation.en: Yeah, and he can't find out I'm doing this.
translation.es: Sí, y él no puede saber que los ayudo.

translation.en: All in favor of Mandy being chief engineer?
translation.es: ¿Quién vota a Mandy como ingeniera jefe?

translation.en: You said you wanted the one who made it quick.
translation.es: Tú pediste a quien le dio velocidad.

translation.en: I really appreciate you helping me out.
I want to say thank you by...
Yep. [Colin] I'll go see if Patrick needs anything.
translation.es: - Sí.- Iré a ver si Patrick necesita algo.

translation.en: I thought it'd be cool to see what you guys do for fun-ness around here.
translation.es: ...pensé que sería genial verqué hacen por aquí para divertirse.

translation.en: I'll meet you at the Rollerdrome tomorrow at six.
translation.es: ...que nos vemos en el patinódromomañana a las seis.

translation.en: What the hell are you doing?
I had to drop off your keys.
Right, and somehow break a $150 Thomastik-Infeld D string.
translation.es: Claro, y a romperla cuerda re Thomastik-Infeld de $ 150.

translation.en: You're so young. Who's your mate?
Thing is, I've got a date with your mother tonight.
translation.es: Lo que pasa es que tengouna cita con tu madre esta noche.

translation.en: I've come to realize that I don't know what she likes.
translation.es: ...me di cuentade que no sé qué le gusta.

translation.en: Just give me a second, mate.
I'm just... I'm afraid she's gonna think I'm really boring.
translation.es: Tengo miedo de que pienseque soy muy aburrido.

translation.en: Look, don't talk about yourself too much. Ask questions.
translation.es: No hables mucho de ti. Haz preguntas.

translation.en: -Where'd you get all this stuff? -My dad.
translation.es: - ¿De dónde sacaste todo esto?- Mi papá.

translation.en: Well, he was a very wise man.
I mean, most of the time, you're covered in grease.
translation.es: Bueno, sueles estar cubierta de grasa.

translation.en: You didn't have an idea. You just looked around, saw the Humongous Claw,
translation.es: No tenías ninguna ida.Miraste a tu alrededor, viste la garra

translation.en: That doesn't mean it's not fun.
translation.es: No significa que no sea divertido.

translation.en: Hey, do you wanna go and see the new Steve Carell movie tonight?
translation.es: ¿Quieres ir a ver la nueva películade Steve Carell esta noche?

translation.en: That'd be great. [stammers] It's playing up at the Orana Cinema.
translation.es: - Sería genial.- La proyectan en el cine Orana.

translation.en: if you wanted to, we could go to the Jade Temple.
translation.es: ...si quieres, podríamos iral Templo de Jade.

translation.en: Are you singing a Daryl Braithwaite song?
I've never heard of him. Actually, that's not true.
translation.es: Nunca lo escuché.De hecho, no es cierto.

translation.en: -Why would you do that? -I don't know.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué lo hiciste?- No lo sé.

translation.en: Someone told me that you liked him, so I thought I'd impress you.
translation.es: Me dijeron que te gustabay quise impresionarte.

translation.en: Look, why don't we do something that we'd both like to do?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no hacemos algoque nos guste a ambos?

translation.en: So no Steve Carell, no Daryl Braithwaite, no Chinese restaurant,
translation.es: Nada de Steve Carell,ni Daryl Braithwaite, ni comida china,

translation.en: no whatever else my son said that I'd like.
translation.es: ni nada de lo que mi hijote dijo que me gusta.

translation.en: Although I'd still like Chinese food. Do you want to do that?
translation.es: Pero me gustaría cenar comida china.¿Quieres?

translation.en: Oh, good. Yeah, I'm dying for a dim sim.
translation.es: Bien. Sí, muero por un dim sim.

translation.en: [Mandy] If you finish in the top three and you make it through to Nationals,
translation.es: Si estás entre los tres primerosy llegas a los nacionales,

translation.en: it's my first step towards becoming the next Leena Gade.
translation.es: es mi primer paso para serla próxima Leena Gade.

translation.en: She's the first woman to engineer a car that won Le Mans.
translation.es: La primera mujer en diseñar un autoque ganó un Le Mans.

translation.en: I want to be her but in Formula 1.
translation.es: Quiero ser ella, pero en Fórmula 1.

translation.en: Well, we'd better win then, hey?
[Mandy] My dad and I used to come here when I was little.
translation.es: Solía venir aquí con mi papácuando era niña.

translation.en: We haven't been for a while.
Oh, man. And here I am blabbering on.
[chuckles] We used to drive around on the weekends in his old car.
translation.es: Solíamos pasear los fines de semanaen su viejo auto.

translation.en: I'm sorry. This was supposed to be fun.
translation.es: Lo siento. Esto no es divertido.

translation.en: Actually, this is the most fun-ness I've had in a long time.
translation.es: De hecho, es lo más divertido que he hechoen mucho tiempo.

translation.en: You know, R2-D2 speaks perfect English in the Star Wars movies,
translation.es: Arturito habla perfectoen La guerra de las galaxias,

translation.en: but all we hear are the beeps, because he loves to drop the f-bomb so much. [chuckles]
translation.es: pero solo escuchamos los pitidosporque dice muchas malas palabras.

translation.en: That's my brother and his ass clown mates.
translation.es: Mi hermano y sus idiotas amigos.

translation.en: Well, it was fun while it lasted.
So? We work all night and hit Dean where it hurts. On the track.
translation.es: ¿Y? Trabajamos toda la noche le pegamos a Dean donde más le duele:en la pisa.

translation.en: Personally, I'd rather hit him in the nuts, but... on the track works too.
translation.es: Yo preferiría pegarle en las bolas,pero la pista también funciona.

translation.en: We need a new brake disc. This one is toast.
translation.es: Necesitamos un disco de freno nuevo.Este está frito.

translation.en: [Mandy] My dad won't give me anything if he finds out I'm working with a rival team.
translation.es: Mi papá no me daría nada si se enterade que estoy trabajando con un rival.

translation.en: Look, I'm sure you'll do great in prison,
translation.es: Seguro que te irá genial en prisión,

translation.en: but my delicate constitution isn't suited to a life behind bars.
translation.es: pero mi delicada constituciónno es apropiada para la vida carcelaria.

translation.en: [Mandy] No one's going to prison, Colin. We're just gonna fix what they destroyed.
translation.es: Nadie irá a prisión, Colin.Solo arreglamos lo que ellos destruyeron.

translation.en: Now, keep your balaclavas on. There's cameras everywhere.
translation.es: No se quiten los pasamontañas.Hay cámaras por todos lados.

translation.en: So if anyone approaches the building, you have to let us know.
translation.es: Si alguien se acerca al edificio,debes avisarnos.

translation.en: [Colin] All right. If I see anyone coming, I'll make a bird sound like...
translation.es: Bien. Si veo a alguien venir,trinaré como un pájaro así...

translation.en: [Ted laughs snidely] I'll bet you're last! [Dean] Here comes the ankle tap! Oh!
-[Ted] Dean, tell us the code. -[Dean] You're dreaming.
translation.es: - Dean, dinos el código.- Ni loco.

translation.en: Fire up the PlayStation. I'll get some drinks.
-Shotgun player one! -You're always player one. It's my turn.
translation.es: - ¡Soy el jugador uno!- Siempre res tú, es mi turno.

translation.en: [Ted] I'm player one. I'm the best.
translation.es: Soy el jugador uno. Soy el mejor.

translation.en: [Ralph] Hey, Dean. Get me a lemonade.
[Ralph] Ralph, three. Ted, nothing. You ain't gonna stop me.
translation.es: Ralph, tres. Ted, nada.No me detendrán.

translation.en: -'Cause I'm the best! -[Dean] Coming right up.
That's the lamest thing you've ever said.
translation.es: Es lo más tonto que jamás hayas dicho.

translation.en: It's amazing you don't get heartburn.
translation.es: Es increíble que no te dé acidez.

translation.en: Ah, it's all right. I'll just get Colin to FaceTime you.
translation.es: Está bien. Le diré a Colinque te llame por Facebook.

translation.en: I like to call it FT.
-Don't do that scary sliding thing. -Don't worry, Mum.
translation.es: - No hagas trompos, da miedo.- Tranquila, mamá.

translation.en: [woman] You're clearly favorite to take the Under-16 State Championship.
translation.es: Eres el favorito para ganarel sub-16 estatal.

translation.en: Are you confident of a win?
Yes, well, of course I would love to win State this year.
translation.es: Sí, bueno, claro.Me encantaría ganar este año.

translation.en: But, at this point in time, I'm just taking it one day after the next.
translation.es: Pero por ahora iré paso a paso.

translation.en: [Jack] Let me give you a tip.
Everybody takes it one day after the next.
translation.es: Todo el mundo va paso a paso.

translation.en: See you at the finish line.
Mate, you've got to stand up to him, okay?
Hi. I'm here to register for the Under-16s.
translation.es: Hola. Vine a registrarmepara el sub-16.
Terminó la sesión de calificación de KA3y el favorito,

translation.en: and title favorite Dean Zeta is in first place.
translation.es: Terminó la sesión de calificación de KA3y el favorito, Dean Zeta, está en primer lugar.En segundo...
Dean Zeta, está en primer lugar.En segundo...

translation.en: You're gonna be a lot faster with some new tires on.
translation.es: Irás mucho más rápidocon neumáticos nuevos.

translation.en: It's a good thing I brought a set then, isn't it?
Just focus on the race. Remember the rules of the overtake.
translation.es: Concéntrate en la carrera.Recuerda las reglas para sobrepasar.

translation.en: Analyze what the other drivers are doing.
translation.es: Analizar lo que hacen los otros pilotos.
Y bailar como si nadie te viera.

translation.en: Aren't you gonna give me a motivational speech?
I mean something rousingly inspirational about never giving up,
translation.es: No, digo, algo emocionante e inspiradorsobre no rendirse,

translation.en: and doing your best, and the eye of the tiger and all that?
translation.es: dar lo mejor y la concentración.Todo eso.

translation.en: I mean, I could do all that. It would feel a bit forced now.
translation.es: Podría decir algo.Se sentiría un poco forzado ahora.

translation.en: I mean, that stuff's got to be spontaneous.
[in unison] I attack until I lead. I take no prisoners. I never concede.
translation.es: Atacar hasta liderar. Sin piedad.Nunca darse por vencido.

translation.en: Whoever said winning isn't everything is a fool who knows nothing.
translation.es: El que dijo que ganar no es importantees un tonto ignorante.

translation.en: let's see how fast you really are.
the top three finishers will advance to the National finals.
translation.es: los tres primeros pasarána la final nacional.

translation.en: Dean Zeta leads with daylight second.
translation.es: Dean Zeta lidera con un amplio margen.

translation.en: They're traveling at 100 km an hour a few millimeters above the ground.
translation.es: Van a 100 km por horaa unos milímetros del suelo.

translation.en: You make your own luck in a kart.
translation.es: Todo depende de ti en un kart.

translation.en: And Jack Hooper slices through the field.
translation.es: Y Jack Hooper se desliza por la pista.

translation.en: Jack Hooper has a monster lunge down the back straight and picks up three places!
translation.es: ¡Jack Hooper da una estampida monstruosaen la recta y gana tres lugares!

translation.en: [announcer] Storming performance from the new boy from Busselton.
translation.es: Un desempeño arrasadordel nuevo chico de Busselton.

translation.en: He's hugging the inside of the track like it's his favorite granny.
translation.es: Abraza la pistacomo si fuera su abuela favorita.

translation.en: Remember the rules of the overtake.
Analyze what the other drivers are doing.
translation.es: Analizar lo que hacen los otros pilotos.

translation.en: The top three can cruise home from here, and they'll be through to the Nationals.
translation.es: Los tres primeros a velocidad crucerollegarán a los nacionales.

translation.en: Hooper throws one up the inside and steals it.
translation.es: Hooper sobrepasa a uno por dentroy le roba el puesto.

translation.en: [Jack] I'm coming for you, dude man.
A beautifully-constructed pass, but also completely unnecessary.
Hooper didn't get the memo about holding positions.
translation.es: Hooper no se enteróde que debe mantener la posición.

translation.en: Hooper tries to dive for first.
He muscles Jack Hooper wide. We're on the final lap.
translation.es: Obliga a Jack Hooper a abrirse.¡Es la última vuelta!

translation.en: -[Jack's dad] Show no fear. -[Mandy] Don't go on the outside.
translation.es: - No muestres miedo.- No te salgas de la pista.

translation.en: [Patrick] I told you you weren't ready. [Mandy] Get on the marbles, you will slide off.
translation.es: - Te dije que no estabas listo.- Sobre las canicas te resbalarás.

translation.en: Jack Hooper finished fourth and backwards over the finishing line.
translation.es: Jack Hooper quedó cuartoy de espaldas a la línea de llegada.

translation.en: You were second and we were on our way to Nationals,
translation.es: Estabas segundo,íbamos camino a los nacionales

translation.en: and instead you threw it away
translation.es: y lo arruinastecon una maniobra imprudente.

translation.en: by making a reckless move that wasted all our time and effort.
translation.es: y lo arruinastecon una maniobra imprudente. Desperdiciaste nuestro tiempo y esfuerzo.

translation.en: I just had to beat him. But you didn't.
translation.es: - Solo quería ganarle.- Pero no lo hiciste.

translation.en: And you didn't even qualify, so you could beat him when it counted.
translation.es: Ni siquiera calificastepara vencerlo cuando valiera la pena.

translation.en: You put yourself ahead of the team, and I can't be with someone who does that.
translation.es: Te pusiste por sobre el equipoy no puedo estar con alguien que hace eso.

translation.en: Looks like you backed the wrong horse, mate.
translation.es: Al parecer le apostasteal caballo equivocado.

translation.en: Come on. Help us load this in.
Come on. We're doing this for you. Chop chop.
translation.es: Vamos. Lo hacemos por ti. Va, va.

translation.en: you'd still be in that caravan hiding from the world, like a sad old man.
translation.es: ...estarías escondiéndote del mundoen tu caravana como un viejo triste.

translation.en: You know, that was a bit harsh.
-I saw the accident. -Don't want to talk about it.
translation.es: - Vi el accidente.- No quiero hablar.

translation.en: -Well, I do. -Don't want to talk about it, Mum.
-I don't think you should race anymore. -You don't have to worry about it!
translation.es: - Creo que no deberías correr más.- No te preocupes.

translation.en: I didn't make it through to Nationals!
[Jack's dad] Look after your mum when I'm gone, mate.
translation.es: Cuida a tu mamá cuando no esté, amigo.

translation.en: -♪ I found notes that you hid ♪ -Jack!
-[Christie] That's it, there. There. -[Barry] All right.
Jack, you've got to talk to me. Why do you keep doing this?
translation.es: Jack, tienes que hablar conmigo.¿Por qué sigues haciendo esto?

translation.en: Me and Dad used to do them when we drove around.
translation.es: Papá y yo los hacíamoscuando manejábamos.

translation.en: So I take your car out and for a little while, I just...
translation.es: Así que saco tu auto y por un momento...

translation.en: it's like he's... with me again.
translation.es: ...es como si élestuviera conmigo otra vez.

translation.en: And I don't know how to fix it.
Some things you just can't fix.
But this pain that you feel...
I mean, it's already happening, and I don't want it to.
translation.es: Digo, ya está pasando y no quiero.

translation.en: I don't want to forget him.
Oh, we won't let that happen.
Just let it out. You'll feel better.
Yeah, well, Dad said blokes only get three cries in life.
translation.es: Dijo que los hombressolo lloran tres veces en la vida.

translation.en: And if I have to choose between this
translation.es: Si tengo que elegir entre esto
y que lo guardes todo dentrohasta volverte loco

translation.en: until you lose it and steal my car again...
translation.es: y que lo guardes todo dentrohasta volverte loco y me robes el auto otra vez...

translation.en: Mate, I know you're there. I can see your curtains twitching.
translation.es: Amigo, sé que estás ahí.Veo que se mueven las cortinas.

translation.en: I know what I said was terrible, and I'm an idiot.
translation.es: Sé que lo que dije fue terribley que soy un idiota.

translation.en: And I don't deserve you as my bestie.
translation.es: Y no te merezco como mi mejor amigo.

translation.en: The driver who came second at State had an illegal carburetor.
translation.es: El segundo de las estatales tenía un carburador ilegal.

translation.en: And I've been promoted to third.
And I can race at Nationals.

translation.es: No importa. El kart está destrozado.

translation.en: I managed to piss off everyone on my team,
translation.es: Hice enojar a todo mi equipo

translation.en: and you don't want me to do it anyway.
translation.es: y tú no quieres que corra.

translation.en: Well, if it's something that you really love...
translation.es: Si es algo que amas de verdad,

translation.en: I guess I'll just have to be brave.
translation.es: supongo que tendré que ser valiente.

translation.en: Just get your team back together.
You know, girls kind of like it when you apologize.
translation.es: A las chicas les gustacuando alguien se disculpa.

translation.en: Heard you lucked through to Nationals.
translation.es: Oí que entraste de suerteen los nacionales.

translation.en: And that means you're gonna need to fix your kart.
translation.es: Significa que deberás arreglar tu kart.

translation.en: And I'm not gonna let you steal any more of our parts.
translation.es: Y no te dejaré robar más partes.

translation.en: You do need to be punished for the last time you robbed us.
translation.es: Mereces un castigopor la última vez que nos robaste.
¡Deja a mi mejor amigo en paz!

translation.en: -Standing up to them. Showing no fear. -I love it!
translation.es: - Me les enfrento. Sin miedo.- ¡Me encanta!

translation.en: -Does it mean you accept my apology? -Yeah, but don't do it again.
translation.es: - ¿Aceptas mi disculpa?- Sí, pero no vuelvas a hacerlo.

translation.en: I shouldn't have said what I said.
translation.es: No debí haber dicho lo que dije.

translation.en: I was upset, and I took it out on you.
translation.es: Estaba molesto y me desquité contigo.

translation.en: And I hope you can forgive me.
because you did get me out of the caravan.
You want to get out one more time?
The driver who came second at State was disqualified.
translation.es: El piloto que quedó segundofue descalificado.

translation.en: we're going to Nationals in his place.
translation.es: ...iremos a los nacionales en su lugar.

translation.en: And I can't go through something like that again.
translation.es: Y no puedo volver a pasar por eso.

translation.en: Look, I'm trying to push it to the limit.
You don't want to be fearless.
You don't want that. Fear is good.
Fear tells you when you push too far.
translation.es: El miedo te avisacuando te pasas del límite.

translation.en: Doesn't it separate the winners from everyone else?
translation.es: ¿No separa a los ganadores de los demás?

translation.en: No. It separates the dead men from those that get to go home.
translation.es: No. Separa a los muertosde los que logran volver a casa.

translation.en: It's why I was reluctant to help you in the first place.
translation.es: Por eso me resistí a ayudarteal principio.

translation.en: Because, honestly, when I saw you racing for the first time, it was like I was watching myself.
translation.es: Honestamente, cuando te vi correrpor primera vez, me vi a mí mismo.

translation.en: And I thought I could help you avoid some of the mistakes that I've made.
translation.es: Creí que podría ayudarte a no cometermis mismos errores.

translation.en: We were racing. I was behind my teammate, and I...
translation.es: Estábamos corriendo.Estaba detrás de mi compañero...

translation.en: tried an overtake which was risky, stupid.
translation.es: Intenté sobrepasarlo,de una forma arriesgada y estúpida.

translation.en: And we clipped, and I sent him into the wall.
translation.es: Nos rozamos y salió volando a la pared.

translation.en: Was it the guy in the photo?
Trying to be fearless on the track, I ended up killing...
translation.es: No tuve miedo en la pistay acabé matando...

translation.en: a man who was very important to me.
So, honestly, I don't think I'm the right man to be teaching you--
translation.es: De verdad, no creo ser la persona adecuadapara enseñarte.

translation.en: You've taught me a lot. Let me show you at Nationals.
translation.es: Me enseñaste mucho.Déjame demostrártelo en el campeonato.

translation.en: But you've taught me a lot.
Let me show you at Nationals.
What was the first thing I ever told you?
translation.es: ¿Qué fue lo primero que te dije?

translation.en: The stuff about sinking the boat?
That I don't want a life in motor racing?
translation.es: ¿Que no me conviene la vida de carreras?

translation.en: Come on. We've got a kart to fix.
translation.es: Vamos. Tenemos un kart que reparar.

translation.en: See how you've been muscled wide by that kid?
You need to be more aggressive defending your position.
[woman on TV] ...come from all around the region.
Loads of talent from all the young kids.
translation.es: Todos los niños son muy talentosos.

translation.en: I want to throw it to the principal and the band master
translation.es: Quiero preguntarle al directory al maestro de la banda

translation.en: to tell us about what sort of music they're gonna play.
translation.es: qué clase de música van a tocar.

translation.en: Who are you, and what have you done with my son?
translation.es: ¿Quién eres tú y qué le hiciste a mi hijo?

translation.en: [chuckles] See? I do listen to you.
-Wish me luck. -Luck. I'll see you there.
translation.es: - Deséame suerte.- Suerte. Nos vemos allá.

translation.en: Rounding up the qualifying session from the KA3
translation.es: Termina la sesión clasificatoria del KA3

translation.en: and it's nationals title favorite Dean Zeta sitting on pole position.
translation.es: y el favorito del título nacional,Dean Zeta, está en el primer puesto.

translation.en: My steering was all over the shop.
I've got no idea what that is.
I know I was handed the keys to the...
and dropped them in the moat.
What I'm trying to say is...
I'm sorry for what I did.
If I could go back and change it...
translation.es: Si pudiera deshacer lo que hice,

translation.en: You think adding that second please will make the difference between me saying yes or no?
translation.es: ¿Crees que agregar otro "por favor"hará la diferencia entre un sí y un no?

translation.en: [announcer] With water on the track, there won't be much grip,
translation.es: La pista está mojada,no habrá mucho agarre.

translation.en: so we'll see the karts slip and slide around the corners tonight.
translation.es: Veremos los karts resbalaren todas las curvas esta noche.

translation.en: It should make for an epic race.
So keeps missing the apexes, right?
translation.es: Así que los ejes se siguen saliendode control.

translation.en: It looked like he was driving a box of cats.
translation.es: Parecía que conducíauna caja de gatos.

translation.en: We've got 20 minutes till the race.
What do you think? Can you fix it?
Of course I can. It's me.
What do you think you're doing?
I'm chief engineer of this kart.
translation.es: Soy ingeniera jefe de este kart.

translation.en: What did you think I was gonna do?
Wait around, sorting bolts for people who don't appreciate me?
translation.es: ¿Esperar ordenando tornillospara la gente que no me aprecia?

translation.en: You never let me work on the kart. We built this using my ideas.
translation.es: Nunca me dejas trabajar en el kart.Construimos este usando mis ideas.

translation.en: It cost one tenth of yours, and it's quick enough to beat it.
translation.es: Cuesta una décima del tuyoy es tan rápido que puede vencerte.

translation.en: I'm not discussing this in front of strangers.
translation.es: No discutiré esto frente a extraños.

translation.en: "They're not strangers, Dad. They're my team."
translation.es: "No son extraños para mí.Son mi equipo".

translation.en: Thank you. Now let's fix this kart and win this thing, yeah?
translation.es: Gracias. Ahora arreglemos este karty ganemos la carrera, ¿sí?

translation.en: Whoever said winning isn't everything is a fool who knows nothing.
translation.es: El que dijo que ganar no es importantees un tonto ignorante.

translation.en: [announcer] Last call for entrants for the KA3 final.
translation.es: Última llamada para la final de KA3.

translation.en: You're required in the marshaling area immediately.
translation.es: Todos deben presentarse en la pistade inmediato.

translation.en: I'll try not to be, but I...
Yeah, it's called the red mist. Keep it open.
Yeah. It happens to a lot of people.
translation.es: Sí. Le sucede a mucha gente.

translation.en: Believe me, if you want to have any success on the track
translation.es: Créeme, si quieres lograr algo en la pista

translation.en: you're gonna have to learn how to control it.
the only thing that ever worked for me...
Sometimes the simple things work best.
translation.es: A veces las cosas simples funcionan mejor.

translation.en: So are you gonna give me the motivational speech?
we've established that's not my strong suit, all right, but...
translation.es: ...que establecimosque no es mi fuerte, pero...

translation.en: Go on, get to it. You're burning...
The last race of the night is the KA3 class final.
translation.es: La última carrera de la nochees la final de la clase KA3.

translation.en: A 20-lapper, at the end of which, we'll have a new national champion.
translation.es: Serán 20 vueltas para saberquién será el nuevo campeón nacional.

translation.en: Welcome to our television viewers as we go live around Australia.
translation.es: ¡Bienvenidos, televidentes!Saldremos en vivo para todo el país.

translation.en: Dean Zeta leads by two kart lengths. He looks like the man to beat tonight.
translation.es: Dean Zeta lidera por dos karts.Parece el hombre a vencer esta noche.

translation.en: -Come on. -Come on, you've got this, Dean.
Back in the pack and the elbows are out.
translation.es: Ahora van juntos, los codos fuera.

translation.en: Jack Hooper fires one up the inside and picks up a place.
translation.es: Jack Hooper se dispara por dentroy avanza un lugar.

translation.en: A monster lunge by Hooper and he grabs another place!
translation.es: ¡Una embestida monstruosa de Hoopery se roba otro lugar!

translation.en: Dean Zeta, showing all of his experience, and he skips away at the front.
translation.es: Dean Zeta, mostrando toda su experiencia,y se escapa al frente.

translation.en: Hooper threads the needle through turn three
translation.es: Hooper enhebra la aguja por la curva tres
tres con una gran carga de subviraje.

translation.en: Analyze what the other drivers are doing.
translation.es: Analizar lo que hacen los otros pilotos.

translation.en: Hooper gets a run and throws one down the inside.
translation.es: Hooper acelera y se lanza por dentro.

translation.en: Hooper looks the only driver capable of challenging Zeta.
translation.es: Hooper parece ser el único conductorcapaz de desafiar a Zeta.

translation.en: Hooper thought about it, but Zeta-- Ooh! Slams the door. There was no way past.
translation.es: Hooper lo pensó, Zeta le cerró la puerta.No hay forma de pasar.

translation.en: You have to learn how to control it.

translation.es: Colin Faber.No quiero perderme la aventura.

translation.en: -I don't want to miss out on an adventure. -Two.
translation.es: Colin Faber.No quiero perderme la aventura. Dos.

translation.en: [announcer] Zeta and Hooper, first and second on the road.
translation.es: Zeta y Hooper,primero y segundo en el camino.

translation.en: This is dangerous. There's absolutely no grip out there.
translation.es: Es peligroso. No hay nada de agarre ahí.

translation.en: Hooper cuts up the inside and slingshots out of the final corner!
translation.es: ¡Hooper sale por dentroy sale disparado a la última curva!

translation.en: Jack Hooper is your new national champion.
translation.es: Jack Hooper es el nuevo campeón nacional.

translation.en: What a drive. What a mega race.
That was Australian motorsport at its finest.
translation.es: El automovilismo australianoen su máxima expresión.

translation.en: Dean Zeta finished second. Jack Kagan was third,
translation.es: Dean Zeta terminó segundo. Jack Kagan fue tercero,
y ellos son los tres primeros.

translation.en: -I couldn't have done it without you. -I know.
translation.es: - No podría haberlo hecho sin ti.- Lo sé.

translation.en: Did you count back from five?
I'm, uh... I'm gonna give Patrick a hand.
[announcer] Ladies and gentlemen, please join us for the presentation ceremony.
translation.es: Damas y caballeros, acompáñennosa la ceremonia de presentación.
